Class LoggingAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testng.asserts.Assertion
      • org.testng.asserts.LoggingAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssertLifecycle

    public class LoggingAssert
extends Assertion
    Log the messages of all the assertions that get run.
